column3: “The Mist I picked up had to be the most trichome packed buds so far this year. Mostly bright green but one of the smaller nugs had a very dark tint, almost purple. The high had me uplifted from the start but the further I dove into the bowl the more energetic and adventurous I got. Also the high made me very talkative throughout the rest of the night. Me and my friend even went down to a spot by the Mississippi river...”

“I'd give this a 4.5  Used this to help with chronic nausea & other g.i. issues,depression,and for chronic pain from degenerative disc disease. It worked great for all. It did (as other reviews have said here and elsewhere) give me a burst of much needed energy & also helped my thoughts&conscious to become clearer(a miracle effect since I have ADHD also) smoke was light & citrusy tasting with a touch of woodsy notes. ...”

“Wow this stuff is the premo top shelf quality. I went from normal to having a big cheesy grin all over my face. Euphoric lift off like no other strain I've tried. Clear, energetic. No red eyes or couchlock. I'd highly recommend for anxiety and depression in particular. If I could only have one strain for the rest of my life this is it. A must try for any smoker. I'd rate this my first and only 10/10.”

“I am really impressed with the Kali Mist." This was my first time trying it and it surpassed all the hype. I picked up a joint from a club in San Jose and got down to business. I smoked it and felt like a million bucks. It had that TRUE Sativa effect. The high was smooth and very uplifting. It's great for daytime sessions or after a stressful day at work. And yes
column4: I will be adding it to the rotation list. The list i...”"

column3: “This shits amazing. Seriously. It puts me in a good mood and I suffer from depression. It energizes me too. I had a bowl to myself and cleaned my entire house. Twice. I recommend this to everyone who needs to relax.”

“Smoked this on the off chance in Amsterdam had never heard of it before and just by its name and appearance it drew me in.

Glad it did, i smoked a whole joint with a Mint Tea overlooking the water by central station. I first felt it in my face, but instead of the pressure behind the eyes i got a warm glowing sensation under my eyes on top of my cheeks.

Next as it spread over my body i became extremely euphoric ...”

“This is a great strain. I have chronic depression and anxiety and I tried this out. Right now, I am very uplifted and have a boost of energy to do the things I want to do without worry and it makes me relaxed at the same time. The experience has been VERY psychedelic to me, just yesterday, I was able to perceive my friend in a different perspective, (I saw him as a completely different person, visually). Kaleidoscope...”

“I am amazed at all the little tiny buds in the pictures, for me it grew 2m high and had coalas the size of a weightlifters arms. Possibly the most medicinal strain i have ever had the joy to use. Very functional and focused enabling me to function with the public in the huge busy city centre without loosing my cool and bailing on the mission. If you keep topping up too soon without letting the cannabinoids in your sy...”

“Open up the jar and it seems you get sprayed with a tropical mist. Typical sativa look: tight cone nugs, chewbacca hairy, brown sugar coated. Tastes like a dream, mix of Jack Herer and Hawaiian Haze, if I had to put my finger on it. High doesn't last very long at all, unfortunately, but that's okay, I don't mind packing another vape bowl. Fantastic for hanging out, working out, swimming, anything interactive!  Do not...”

“I could not give this a higher )lol( rating. It is a really, really, mellow but powerful Sativa. I would put this at the top of my list for Sativa being: 

1) Kali Mist
2) Durban Poison
3) Sour Diesel”

“When smoked from bong one can clearly see why this unique strain has its name. These flowers provided one of the greatest feelings I've had in my few years of smoking. One bowl will take you to heaven if hit the right way. Would definitely recommend to anyone. Got it at a local recreational shop.”

“Incredibly energetic, excellent for getting tasks done throughout the day. Clear headed high with mental clarity. Little bout of happiness, nothing much more to the high. Energy and clarity are the key aspects of the high. Taste is lovely. Fairly buttery taste to start, which turns into more sweet and citrus flavours along with strong earthy notes on the exhale. Great smoke would definitely buy again.”

“This, so far, is my all time favorite sativa. 
Originally grown myself from mail order seeds in a grow closet in the late 90's. 
Couldn't believe the flavours, aromas and the high!
The aroma put out by slightly crushing the bud was anise, sage and something like cedar with a dash of black pepper once and a while.
Smoke was also spicy and earthy 
The high was uplifting and energizing while also being almost psychedeli...”
“Just got to smoke a bowl of this and just wow, smells sweet and taste amazing. effects come shortly after smoking and just leaves you in a focused mind set able to get things done.”

“This strain seemed harsh to the throat and hard to take large hits. The effects were very clear headed and energetic, but when it wares off it resulted in exhaustion and the feeling of being fried". Not my favorite strain.”"

“I'm giving this strain another quick shout out because it's my favorite daytime strain right now. After I smoke it and seriously bounces up and down and can't sit still. Maybe the best wake and baker" out there. Yeah Kali!”"

“I'm giving this strain another quick shout out because it's my favorite daytime strain right now. After I smoke it and seriously bounces up and down and can't sit still. Maybe the best wake and baker" out there. Yeah Kali!”"

“This strain seemed harsh to the throat and hard to take large hits. The effects were very clear headed and energetic, but when it wares off it resulted in exhaustion and the feeling of being fried". Not my favorite strain.”"

“Ok.  Kali Mist is my favourite sativa strain thus far.  Tasty little sugar-coated nugs with rusty brown hair.  The smell is strong, flavour smooth.  After three good rips put the water pipe down and enjoy the effects.  Soon afterward, you will want to do something active and be social.  Agree with other reviewers that this is not the nighttime herb.”
“I dunno this shit is pretty good awesome high very recommended.”
“flavor was very nice and easy on the lungs. great high very energetic, euphoric and your not looking for the nearest couch and doughnut,”

“I may be partially biased because I grew this strain myself, but I fell in love with this strain. Once I harvested and was able to try this strain, I knew that I needed to grow this strain in a perpetual cycle so that I could always have a steady supply. 

This was a strain that I continued to enjoy all the way until I ran out. I smoked an ounce in a month because I enjoyed the effects so much. Every time I smoked I ...”

“Quite possibly my favorite strain of all time. I had this about a decade ago and still have fond memories of it. The description says it can verge on psychedelic at times, which is absolutely correct. I had a delicious burrito while high on this, and with each bite, I'd close my eyes and see bursts of color. Absolutely magical strain, and I haven't had it since, and I really miss it :(”

“The nugs are more spindly looking with collections of smaller buds surrounding the stalk.  A nice medium green with an abundance of orange hairs.

Interestingly enough I find it difficult to get a scent from this plant.  Even on fresh grind I could only detect a faint peppery smell.  Definitely unique.  Busts out average.

Commencing vaporization of .2...

Decent vapor with kind of and earthy sweet flavour on exhale....”

“Gave me lots of energy, which made me really productive around the house.  Really strong head high and made my heart race.  Got a little anxious as Sativas can do to me sometimes, but not overwhelming.”

“I gave Kali mist a 10 just cuz its my favorite Sativa and i good heavy hitting one great for a wake n bake and all through the day i wouldent smoke this at night if u had a long day of token u wont get the best high it will feel weak thats when u have to start pulling out the indicas but ya great flavor not the strongest smell but smells great :)”
“flavor was very nice and easy on the lungs. great high very energetic, euphoric and your not looking for the nearest couch and doughnut,”

“I may be partially biased because I grew this strain myself, but I fell in love with this strain. Once I harvested and was able to try this strain, I knew that I needed to grow this strain in a perpetual cycle so that I could always have a steady supply. 

This was a strain that I continued to enjoy all the way until I ran out. I smoked an ounce in a month because I enjoyed the effects so much. Every time I smoked I ...”
“Spicy and invigorating, as a chef this strain had me clear headed and banging out orders perfectly. Highly recommended”

“This Strain of Kali mist that I just got from Six Seasons dispensary is by far The Best High of Anything I have Smoked since I got my Dr's rec. This is a Very Spacy High Perfect for Putting on your Headphones close your eyes and listen to your Favorite Tunes You will SEE What I Mean!!( Literally you will SEE what ever your Mind thinks of !)   You won't be disappointed.”
“creativity”
“I appreciated the 'breezy' exhale from Kali Mist. I found this to be a calmer sativa, decent when attention is still required...”

“In Holland in 1998 I seek out this strain.  The coffee shops without it all said you Americans look for the strong stuff.  Finally my Favorite shop in 1998 was Bluebird.  They were much more understanding of us Americans w/ 1 of 2 cafes with glass at the time. I rolled up a Cone from 3grams I purchased. went to another shop where I enjoyed Domino's with the local owner.  I smoked daily and had an obscene amount of TH...”
“I am not a smoker, but after 2 or 3 tokes on this I felt great, you definately come up. A very high weed.”

“Just harvested my first Kali Mist and I see what all the hoopla is about.  My husband and I were both almost giddy.  It was a hard head hit at the beginning and then the tingles started.  Conversation was easy and towards the end of the high, my body was so relaxed.  It pretty much came and went in waves....deliciously relaxing waves.”

“I'm a big indicate guy but this strain is in my top ten. This is a great strain to keep you up, active, and sociable. I wouldn't smoke this strain late unless you're cramming for a late night paper.”

“Very nice make it through the day medication. I have been buying it for a while (2months) and I don't seem to get immune. It never disappoints. Pain easer without the munchies or drowsiness.

Billie”

“This Strain of Kali mist that I just got from Six Seasons dispensary is by far The Best High of Anything I have Smoked since I got my Dr's rec. This is a Very Spacy High Perfect for Putting on your Headphones close your eyes and listen to your Favorite Tunes You will SEE What I Mean!!( Literally you will SEE what ever your Mind thinks of !)   You won't be disappointed.”

“Very strong sativa. Definitely psychedelic in high doses, and your creativity will skyrocket. It made me very quiet because I was tripping so hard, but I have never been so happy in my life. Although it tastes disgusting when smoking it, I'd still recommend it for sure.”
“Spicy and invigorating, as a chef this strain had me clear headed and banging out orders perfectly. Highly recommended”

“This Strain of Kali mist that I just got from Six Seasons dispensary is by far The Best High of Anything I have Smoked since I got my Dr's rec. This is a Very Spacy High Perfect for Putting on your Headphones close your eyes and listen to your Favorite Tunes You will SEE What I Mean!!( Literally you will SEE what ever your Mind thinks of !)   You won't be disappointed.”

“Very strong sativa. Definitely psychedelic in high doses, and your creativity will skyrocket. It made me very quiet because I was tripping so hard, but I have never been so happy in my life. Although it tastes disgusting when smoking it, I'd still recommend it for sure.”
“I am not a smoker, but after 2 or 3 tokes on this I felt great, you definately come up. A very high weed.”

“Potent sativa. A couple hits off a joint had me very high.  That part I liked. The downside for me was that it made my heart race wayyyy too much.  Almost to the point of anxiety and I consider myself a seasoned smoker.  That made it too much for me. Beginners beware!”

“creeping cerebral buzz, after the initial creeping stage a potent high takes effect. creative and a bit hazey, very energetic. good for social situations other than mild paranoia that fades as the peak declines into a fuzz. a cup of coffee can rebalance for activities that require concentration.”

“Kali mist
aroma: citrico herbal floral
sabor:citrico lima limon y floral con toques metalicos
efecto: pura sativa energizante reconfortante , cerebral”

“This is a very strong sativa that is great if you need creative stimulus or just want to have a really weird conversation with someone. It's a very energetic high but low anxiety. It somehow gives you tons of energy but at the same time doesn't make you anxious. 

I found it to be very good for focusing, the only problem is that you will sometimes accidentally focus on the wrong thing, and get lost. It's very stron...”

“I read into this strain before I lit it. so the first taste I got way the earthy woody taste but also a hint of citrus?. I chose this to wake me up at the end of the day and it worked great. although I did experience a bit of anxiety it subsided as I moved on.”
“some of the stinkiest weed ive ever had.. this weed will smell up and entire room no matter what its in”
“variety is very good. only smoke it constantly, I would not recommend it. This variety is not for constant use in my opinion. And the variety no taste, so it is quite not bad.”

“Kali Mist rediscovers your creative part. Despite from Satori, even makes you tripping. Be careful: even if you feel quite lite from one puff, it comes more and more in time. Very powerful strain that I'm sure I will wish to come back again and again”

“Kali mist
aroma: citrico herbal floral
sabor:citrico lima limon y floral con toques metalicos
efecto: pura sativa energizante reconfortante , cerebral”
“I remember smoking this with my friends and it made us want to go for a fun at 2am 😂😂. Great sativa strain! Definitely a personal favorite!”
“Burned and went to the Gym.  Had a little trouble focusing and getting into the zone.  Felt a little hungry, tired, and lazy.  Still was able to do a workout.”

“I read into this strain before I lit it. so the first taste I got way the earthy woody taste but also a hint of citrus?. I chose this to wake me up at the end of the day and it worked great. although I did experience a bit of anxiety it subsided as I moved on.”

“Lovely smell of pineapple mango & hint of coconut, the high is really energetic and really puts a smile on your face and is a excellent daytime smoke and makes you want to get up and do something or you can just relax and think as it is a clear head high. 

This is one of my favorite sativa strains of all time and really helps with my anxiety.”

“Kali Mist rediscovers your creative part. Despite from Satori, even makes you tripping. Be careful: even if you feel quite lite from one puff, it comes more and more in time. Very powerful strain that I'm sure I will wish to come back again and again”
“Good strong strain makes you cough for a minute when it hits the throat! But it's a nice sativa got a gram of it to try and I will definitely be trying it again”

“Great quality (AAA Medical Grade), with Rodolphe we were relaxed, but when I went to bed I had an anxiety attack.

Dispensary : onyx64 (Agora Market)”

“just smoked this strain for the first time and as a well seasoned smoker I am truely impressed by this flawless plant of sweetness. it's fruity flavors engulf my mouth and cotton mouth is non existent.  my body is in a state of bliss untold. positivity is all that's on my mind. now I'm just vibing to my music... definitely I must have and save some for later type shit”

“Kali mist
aroma: citrico herbal floral
sabor:citrico lima limon y floral con toques metalicos
efecto: pura sativa energizante reconfortante , cerebral”

“creeping cerebral buzz, after the initial creeping stage a potent high takes effect. creative and a bit hazey, very energetic. good for social situations other than mild paranoia that fades as the peak declines into a fuzz. a cup of coffee can rebalance for activities that require concentration.”
“Burned and went to the Gym.  Had a little trouble focusing and getting into the zone.  Felt a little hungry, tired, and lazy.  Still was able to do a workout.”

“Pretty great sativa. Hit me with a heady buzz and eye pressure. Sorta felt like gravity flipped on my eyes. Makes me pretty happy. I don't even care that I have work later. Taste nice, sorta sweet with a lingering fresh earthiness. I have no stress and my anxiety is virtually non-existent. Usually a harder sativa would heighten my anxiety, but not this one. It has had a groggy sedative after buzz effect on me towards...”

“Had some very nice looking buds loaded with crystals. Smell was sweet almost fruity, taste was very light. Didn't hit me as strong as some of the other sativa but the follow through was very nice and clearheaded. The feeling was very nice and not overpowering. Had me giddy and ready to just do stuff, the video game session that followed was fun and intense, and this is actually my favorite gaming strain! Very enjoyab...”

“This was a great daytime smoke.  Great for road trips, creative endeavors and walks on the foggy beach.  Great for a hike or cooking a great  dinner.  

Easy to snap" out of.  No lingering effects
anxiety.

“Kali Mistbis light, sweet, and is very tropical. It was a little moist in breakup, and the smoke produced made me feel like I was sitting in the middle of the Rainforest Cafe, eating a cheap $8 burger. I felt great. Energy levels were up from smoking one joint. Enjoy with OJ.”

“This strain gives me energy to do things without anxiety. The taste and smell are nice and herb-fresh, slightly bubblegum/flowerish, and a little bitter like wild flowers. Its unique. Main thing that stands out is its ability to cut through burnout from other strains to produce a CALM but energized AND socially functional state. The reason I dont give it a perfect five that it doesnt chase away the blues quite as wel...”
“very potent stress flys away smoke half a blunt and I'm good”

“creeping cerebral buzz, after the initial creeping stage a potent high takes effect. creative and a bit hazey, very energetic. good for social situations other than mild paranoia that fades as the peak declines into a fuzz. a cup of coffee can rebalance for activities that require concentration.”

“Kali mist
aroma: citrico herbal floral
sabor:citrico lima limon y floral con toques metalicos
efecto: pura sativa energizante reconfortante , cerebral”

“Great quality (AAA Medical Grade), with Rodolphe we were relaxed, but when I went to bed I had an anxiety attack.

Dispensary : onyx64 (Agora Market)”
“Kali Mist is kinda like Cinex.  Two tokes and I feel  energized and emotionally uplifted.  But this high is stonier" than Cinex.  I'm less focused.  For doing intellectual pursuits

“Kali mist
aroma: citrico herbal floral
sabor:citrico lima limon y floral con toques metalicos
efecto: pura sativa energizante reconfortante , cerebral”

“This is a very strong sativa that is great if you need creative stimulus or just want to have a really weird conversation with someone. It's a very energetic high but low anxiety. It somehow gives you tons of energy but at the same time doesn't make you anxious. 

I found it to be very good for focusing, the only problem is that you will sometimes accidentally focus on the wrong thing, and get lost. It's very stron...”

“I read into this strain before I lit it. so the first taste I got way the earthy woody taste but also a hint of citrus?. I chose this to wake me up at the end of the day and it worked great. although I did experience a bit of anxiety it subsided as I moved on.”

“This was a great daytime smoke.  Great for road trips, creative endeavors and walks on the foggy beach.  Great for a hike or cooking a great  dinner.  

Easy to snap" out of.  No lingering effects
anxiety.

“creeping cerebral buzz, after the initial creeping stage a potent high takes effect. creative and a bit hazey, very energetic. good for social situations other than mild paranoia that fades as the peak declines into a fuzz. a cup of coffee can rebalance for activities that require concentration.”

“This stuff won't be much good to you if what you're after is zoning out in front of the TV and eating Funions, If, however, you want to delve into some new and interesting concepts-- if what you're after is refreshing uplifting bouts of fluid confident creativity and clarity of thought, Kali Mist is where its at. This is not a couch potato 'stoner' kind of high. This is a Get up and take on the world" type of deal. ...”"

“This stuff won't be much good to you if what you're after is zoning out in front of the TV and eating Funions, If, however, you want to delve into some new and interesting concepts-- if what you're after is refreshing uplifting bouts of fluid confident creativity and clarity of thought, Kali Mist is where its at. This is not a couch potato 'stoner' kind of high. This is a Get up and take on the world" type of deal. ...”"
“Great strain for getting the creativity flowing. Sit down with a pad and paper, or computer/tablet/phone, etc. and watch the ideas flow through your brain to your fingertips.”

“This is a very strong sativa that is great if you need creative stimulus or just want to have a really weird conversation with someone. It's a very energetic high but low anxiety. It somehow gives you tons of energy but at the same time doesn't make you anxious. 

I found it to be very good for focusing, the only problem is that you will sometimes accidentally focus on the wrong thing, and get lost. It's very stron...”
“Burned and went to the Gym.  Had a little trouble focusing and getting into the zone.  Felt a little hungry, tired, and lazy.  Still was able to do a workout.”
“very potent stress flys away smoke half a blunt and I'm good”
“I remember smoking this with my friends and it made us want to go for a fun at 2am 😂😂. Great sativa strain! Definitely a personal favorite!”
“My all time favorite strain with a pine green, covered in thc that looks like snow with hues of purple, pink, and blue. The tropical flavor is just a bonus to the best sativa high out there. 5/5”
“Such a great strain, immediately puts you in a super happy and uplifted mood. Music sounds great, everything's funny, and it doesn't keep you couch locked. (Cerebral and light body high)”

“I absolutely swear by Kali Mist. Amazing for depression, gives you some energy, and leave you quite clear-headed while feeling really good. A bit heart racey, but dealable. Perfect for daytime working or playing! Love.”
“I Love it.  Not only do I get so much done but I also come up with some great ideas”
“WOW is all I have to say, really recommend this!”
“This was a great wake and bake session. Beautifully hairy buds. Great smoke! The high is just as described in the description!”

“this strain is not for me!! I am a fairly heavy pot smoker. I smoke to help with anxiety as well as recreationally. this strain makes me extremely anxious, the most that has ever been caused by pot. I'm sure it's good for some people, its probably its psychoactive parts that cause me to feel anxious. just writing this to advise someone who does get anxiety to be ready for it. it's nice in a very 
comfortable atmosphe...”
“Awesome strain! Doesn't make super drowsy and keeps you focused on the task at hand. Great strain to toke with friends.”

“A solid and powerful daytime strain with a heady effect yet the user remains clear and focused. This is the plant for anti-depressive effects and for those who lack motivation. Not useful for inducing sleep this medicine should be avoided before bed but as a painkiller functions especially well for women suffering menstrual cramps. (Serious Seeds is the original breeder)”
“Gave me a headache, weed rarely gives me headaches. I wouldn't smoke it again.”
“Went on a pretty good trip on this.. Discretion seems pretty dead on”
“fucking incredible nice big buds beautiful smell very good long lasting high great smoke highly recommend  this strain”
“Good for Daytime”
“forsure a clear minded high, taste was okay overall not to big of a fan for the taste but very mellow head float.”

“This beautiful bud #kalimist was a nice true sativa high. I was absoluetly impressed with this euphoric energetic high. I felt mellow and creative smoking on this beauty! Id give this strain a 🔥🔥🔥🔥 4 out of 5!!!!”
“up mood and very light brain fog.  I would keep this on your list.”
“Great for mornings, and smoking all day long. Recommend you switch to hybrid or Indy after dark w this one or you may be up all night! Very happy, uplifting and creatively inspiring.”
“It had a nice earthy smell and tastd to it. It was very smooth and clean smoking. I was happy with this strain I'll be back for more!”
“Fresh, fluffy, and amazing. That sums it all up.”
“I tried this after the suggestion from a dispensary.  I was good but not as good as I was expecting based on other reviews.  It did however last for several hours.”
“gave me an anxiety attack : (”

“LOVED IT! I tried Kali Mist for the first time a few days ago, and while I had mistaken it for an Indica strain at first, it quickly stood out as one of the strongest Sativas I've ever tried. It completely eased my back pain and gave me energy to spare! This is definitely a get-up-and-go strain for me. I was able to clean the house, make dinner and exercise with very few breaks.”
“Great for mornings, and smoking all day long. Recommend you switch to hybrid or Indy after dark w this one or you may be up all night! Very happy, uplifting and creatively inspiring.”
“up mood and very light brain fog.  I would keep this on your list.”
“forsure a clear minded high, taste was okay overall not to big of a fan for the taste but very mellow head float.”
“Good for Daytime”

“This strain is one for the books. It provided me with an extremely Euphoric effect. I would not use this one while working. It is more for times where you want to feel like one with nature, or explore deep creativity. Awesome strain.”
“first strain that actually got me super stoned lol love it”
“Love the head high, clear thinking n shi”
“Great Strain! A lot of energy!”
“very earthy and sweet overall a good smoke though and a little bit went a long ways”

“Kali mist madrid csc
pura sativa con un humo muy inciensado y un efecto muy agradable y llevadero.”
“Good stuff. It's really energetic and a bit psychodelic. The effects are a bit similar to mdma, but in a weedy" way”"
“really great for a social smoke! however I would need another strain for bedtime, and if my anxiety is bad that day u probably wouldn't smoke this. great for getting out of your shell"

“Wonderful smell and pleasant to smoke, she's so sweet ... :)
Perfect to work at night but makes my eyes a little dry”
“Super super clear and energetic, but not super potent and doesn't last all that long. Solid for exercise or work, but not a personal favorite or a daily go-to”
“Tastes and smells great. Very strong!”
“The only sativa strain I use.”
“A great all day smoke when you need to get stuff done.”
“good sativa effect, I smoked it when riding on a bike in the countryside and it was awesome.”
“no other strain keeps me focused like this one. love it. great in the morning :-)”
“nice and light”

“A very strong Sativa, although a Hybrid you don't get the 10% of Indica when you smoke this. This strain takes about 15-20 mins to kick in and the high is subtle at first and creeps in slowly. Intense visuals and tingles on the feet is what I experienced. A nice day time smoke wouldn't smoke this strain right before bed!”
“I like it!”
“relaxing and energetic”
“Great strain”

“This bud provided more of a zoned out high than other sativa dominant strains I've sampled recently. The flavor was nice, and the smoke itself was dense and plentiful. Maybe not my go-to for days I need to get a ton of stuff done, but overall I'd say it's a pretty solid strain.”
“I think it's great in terms of staying power. The buzz lasts quite a bit longer than most other sativas I've tried.”
“I would say this strain is not bad. Does not hit you that hard, but it still got some kick. Get's you very energetic, good for uses during the day.”
“Nice daytime smoke.  Energy/focus.  Slight headache but not a big deal because you're  in such a great mood.”

“Has a very off-putting oder, but once fired up smoke has a pleasant earthy flavor. For me the high creeps over the top of my head then melts over my face relieving chronic knee pain. Great experience!”
“i like this strain it definitely has that uplifting high to it i still get pretty stoned tho lml”
“Very good for the price. Decent THC, does not make you hungry too much.”
“Very good stuff, I took a nice size dabb an wow am I high!!”
“a super clean tasty smoke!!! Definitely gives you a good kick in the ass!! on point happy weed.”
“Nice head buzz that kept me productive and on my game all day. Recommend for people with social anxiety and ADHD. It really helped me.”
“Really great sativa powerful intense fast acting and long lasting like a long tunnel of happiness”

“Km was the goto strain in the DAM for years so I always had to partake when visiting.  Great clear piney taste with a shiny high that is perfect for riding a bike around Amsterdam's canals and taking in the scenery.  Kali Mist is a must purchase along with Flo.  ns”

“A very unusual strain--you can feel perfectly alert and focused, yet so very high. It's also a high that could be productive if you rely on creativity. It really is some of the best Sativa you can buy.”
“Euforica y muy energética”
“My childhood bud. Gives energy yet calms at the same time, perfect to wake and bake or smoke before daily activities.”
“It was a good smoke but made me so incredibly tired that I fell asleep almost instantly”
“It's a very uplifting happy high, I personally enjoyed it very much!”

“I was skeptical of Leafly's super-high 'creative' rating, but it's true: I  starting thinking about projects after a few vapes. I'm a big fan of creative weed; after trying 80+ strains, my favorites are bubbleberry, cinex, jack herer, cinderella, a few others - but this one beats them (or at least equals them) all, with the added benefit that it's not as jittery as cinex. another plus: some creative strains seem to l...”
“got some from delta 9 and I was expecting so much more than a weak THC  sativa (15%).  It was decent and all but I think they can do better”
“This is some strong, uplifting shit for sure. Great for wake n' bakes! Tried some in Florida a while back and here in Colorado. I was never disappointed by those little, bright-green nugs.”
“Kali Mist is a good strain. It provides a body high, and is good for pain relief. The head high is nice, and a little euphoric.”
“Unfortunately, I had some other non-marijuana related issues present that day that ruined my experience, i still have to say this is one of the best strains ive ever smoked.”

“This is a strain I remember being better a few years ago, recent samples have been a little weak in my opinion. Typical Sativa clear headed high, with no paranoia or anxiety. “I Love it.  Not only do I get so much done but I also come up with some great ideas”

“Smoked this strain while laying down tile in my basement. Kept me going, on my feet, and lingered like a peaceful haze. I didn't crave food any more than I normally would sober, and when it did come time to eat something my body wanted a salad. Great strain if you're looking for something that won't drop you on a sofa with takeout.”
“Outstanding strain.  Strong head buzz, with just an overall sensational feeling.  This got me really high, but still operational.  My favorite sativa along with ATF.”
“fucking incredible nice big buds beautiful smell very good long lasting high great smoke highly recommend  this strain”
“Flava alone...  one of those very distinct pungent types.”

“Helped quell my anxiety, got me doing things I'd normally feel apprehensive about with surprising ease.  A very uplifting and energetic high.  And the smell, oh the smell...so very pungent, so aromatic, just lovely.”
“Smokes smooth, tastes great, gives a wonderful, happy high. Great for pain and stress. One of my all time favorite buds!”

“I've been pretty fucked up so I can't say for sure but everytime I smoke this I feel crazy. Great saliva high. Not much if any indica but as far as sativa I love it. “very earthy flavor with some sweetness and a spicy kick at the end. very nice and enjoyable to smoke. relaxes and relives stress with a tingly head high that leaves u feeling happy and worry free.”
“maintain focus + productivity”
“Such a smooth and easy smoke. Very relaxing both smoked or vaped. Clear headed euphoric, very uplifting, relaxing, and happy. Good for daytime.”

“My all time favourite... 

The first thing I buy when I get to Amsterdam; the best 'adventure fuel' there is!”
“Very good taste long lasting”
“Very nice and uplifting strain. A very strong and long lasting effect but not so energetic as some other sativa strains. Earthy flavours and intense aromas. Would not recommend for new users”

“So far, so good. I’ve been growing a feminized one of these from Dinafem (indoors). Germinated with a wet paper towel and some mykorrhiza (a type of fungi good for healthy root development). In 24 hours it germinated, so I sowed it in a 200ml party cup with regular supermarket compost. Kept it there for 4 weeks under a 16W LED lamp (18 hours of light/day). After that, transplanted it to a 30cm pot (same supermarket c...”

“Great citrus strain. the smell is incredible. love rolling joints with this strain. great head buzz. I ussually smoke it when im switching to night shift and im gaming all night. keeps me focused and always good for watching some stand ups. Smoked it in the summer as well. fantastic social strain. No signs of paranoia setting in at all. just a good time. highly reccomend.”
“Awesome strain! Doesn't make super drowsy and keeps you focused on the task at hand. Great strain to toke with friends.”

“Nice light piney taste. Good buzz if you want to be active and in control (I'm sure this varies with amount used). A bit harsh on the throat and bronchial tubes when smoked, but have ordered a vaporizer and I'm confident that it will make it all better. Delivery of order was fast and discrete, staff were helpful and courteous!”
“High af... Really hungry...”
“Great strain. Taste is refreshing and left me at the first toke. Great all around.”
“Gave me a headache”

“Decent working high, good for out-and-about smoking. 
The flavor was not very noteworthy. Not bad, but not good either.”
“Strong almost indica sensation”
“indica feel to it for being sativa, great for PTSD”
“I have to use quite a bit in one session to get the desired effect. Once you get there, it's great.  A wonderful uplifting high....with a psychedelic aspect. A great getaway.”
“It had a nice earthy smell and tastd to it. It was very smooth and clean smoking. I was happy with this strain I'll be back for more!”
“Went on a pretty good trip on this.. Discretion seems pretty dead on”
“Gave me a headache, weed rarely gives me headaches. I wouldn't smoke it again.”
“This was a great wake and bake session. Beautifully hairy buds. Great smoke! The high is just as described in the description!”

“Good energetic head high. Physchedelic feeling if you smoke a lot! Earthy but sweet flavor. I dig this strain”

“This beautiful bud #kalimist was a nice true sativa high. I was absoluetly impressed with this euphoric energetic high. I felt mellow and creative smoking on this beauty! Id give this strain a 🔥🔥🔥🔥 4 out of 5!!!!”
“From The Green Cross, SF CA”
“My favourite smoke ever, I have not grown this since 2001 and miss it so much but i just do not have the hight space for it indoors at the minute, see photo attached of last time”
“Good strain. It's fun taking hikes. Quite an adventure. Hard to describe the taste though. One thing you gotta do is watch King Of The Hill. Funniest shit to watch. haha.”

“A solid and powerful daytime strain with a heady effect yet the user remains clear and focused. This is the plant for anti-depressive effects and for those who lack motivation. “Smooth and uplifting. Very tasty smoke.”
“Love it..all u need is a couple of hits and ur good”
“not one of my favorite strains”
“Good high. Last decently but a little on the pricey.”

“A hands down favorite! Those Cambodian genetics really do it for me. Super swollen trichrome-drenched calyxes sparsely distributed on lean stalks. Awesome, mildly psychedelic, energizing. “Keeps you very focused and motivated to go out or do something.”

“Well I'm from San Francisco and you can get an 8th of Kali mist for 15$ so yea I had to try it but I must say it is energetic & very uplifting once again I doubted this strain due to the fact of hyped of strains -Cookies -Dutch treat those are superb strains yes but Kali mist is no push over this bud will have you on cloud 9”

“Buzzy, uppity, euphoric onset then a mellow kind buzz without feeling tired finish.  I could smoke this all day.”
“Was a good high. Very potent and good for pain. My girlfriend  also loved it. Amazing strain.”
“energetic+creativity”
“I'm in love! I would consider myself an intermediate smoker and after a few hits I was relaxed. I was high and energetic but still relaxed. Very good strain if you dont want to be sluggish.”

“I vaped this at 350F yesterday evening. It gave me a slight body buzz that didn't affect the whole body, just spots, which was different. It was definitely not a hard hitter for me, just a slight buzz that lasted for 3 hours or so until...”
“goood shit”
“Wonderful experience. Would love to have it again.”

“I miss this strain, my personal favourite. I met her my first coffee shop in Amsterdam. if you love your saliva,  this is a must in my mind, for a nice saliva flavour,  smokability, and no burnt out, mmmmm! oh yea leafly, make a shirt 😊”

“I have this right now. It's alright. I've had better and I've had worse. The buds are very dense. I'm not a big fan of the taste. The high, on the other hand, isn't so bad. Makes me pretty happy and doesn't tire me out if I smoke too much. Hahaha.”

“I always keep an eye out for this one, but it's hard to find. This strain always puts me in a good mood and makes me want to accomplish something. Great for getting some things knocked off the honey-doo list and have fun doing them.”
